Semver contract version as a string.

Indexed(bytes32).notice: Emitted when an attestation has been indexed.

getReceivedAttestationUIDCount(address,b.notice: Returns the total number of attestations to a specific schema which were attested to/received by a     specific recipient.

getReceivedAttestationUIDs(address,bytes.notice: Returns the UIDs of attestations to a specific schema which were attested to/received by a specific     recipient.

getSchemaAttestationUIDCount(bytes32).notice: Returns the total number of attestations to a specific schema.

getSchemaAttestationUIDs(bytes32,uint256.notice: Returns the UIDs of attestations to a specific schema.

getSchemaAttesterRecipientAttestationUID.notice: Returns the total number of UIDs of attestations to a specific schema which were attested by a specific     attester to a specific recipient.
Returns the UIDs of attestations to a specific schema which were attested by a specific attester to a     specific recipient.

getSentAttestationUIDCount(address,bytes.notice: Returns the total number of attestations to a specific schema which were attested by a specific attester.

getSentAttestationUIDs(address,bytes32,u.notice: Returns the UIDs of attestations to a specific schema which were attested by a specific attester.

isAttestationIndexed(bytes32).notice: Returns whether an existing attestation has been already indexed.

version().notice: Returns the full semver contract version.

userdoc.notice: Indexing Service for the Ethereum Attestation Service
